title: If It’s an Old Dragon, It Can Be Beaten With Bare Hands, but Isn’t This Common Sense? (Astonished) - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Depictions of Cruelty   Female Protagonist   Lack of Common Sense   Overpowered Protagonist   Protagonist Strong from the Start   R-15
author: Hata Ryousuke   羽田遼亮
description:
Fill was picked up and raised by the [Great Sage], who once saved the world.

Fill, who was raised as the grandchild of humanity’s strongest great sage, inherited his talent, chanted magic chantless, and defeated dragons with his bare hands.


 
However, one day, the great sage summoned his grandchild and told him:

“Fill, I was silent so far, but you’re a [female].”

Seriously!? By the way, what’s a female?

Fill’s general knowledge didn’t even contain gender. The great sage, who was concerned about his grandchild’s future, decided to enroll Fill into the [Royal Institute].>
